review_data.title: Excellent desserts and breads
review_data.content: Konditorei Berner is located at Hottingerplatz and can be accessed with public transit Tram #3. This small café has stools set up inside at the large window fronts along with several other wooden tables and chairs. The staff was very nice and efficient during my...More
